body: Is the elections in Nigeria this year the beginning of the end of Nigeria's monolithic north?: "Since 1960 when Nigeria gained independence, the North have dominated the political landscape, thus, the zone formed the first government at independence."
original_body: Is the elections in Nigeria this year the beginning of the end of Nigeria's monolithic north?: "Since 1960 when Nigeria gained independence, the North have dominated the political landscape, thus, the zone formed the first government at independence."
title: Nigeria: Is this the death of Nigeria's monolithic north?

sentence: Is the elections in Nigeria this year the beginning of the end of Nigeria's monolithic north?: "Since 1960 when Nigeria gained independence, the North have dominated the political landscape, thus, the zone formed the first government at independence."
